channel.title: Systems on Leonardo Benicio
channel.description: Recent content in Systems on Leonardo Benicio

item.title: Computer Systems: A Programmer's Perspective (3rd ed.)
item.description: Bridges programming and computer architecture with a focus on performance and systems.

item.title: Computer Systems: A Programmer's Perspective (3rd ed.)
item.description: Bridges the gap between programming and computer architecture with a focus on performance and systems.

item.title: Database System Concepts (7th ed.)
item.description: Foundational text on database design, SQL, normalization, transactions, and architectures.

item.title: Distributed Systems: Principles and Paradigms (2nd ed.)
item.description: Foundational coverage of distributed system models, communication, consistency, and coordination.

item.title: Security Engineering (3rd ed.)
item.description: An encyclopedic treatment of security engineering principles, attacks, and defenses.
